## Executive Summary
Implemented a dedicated contact detail page that displays all projects the contact has been associated with. The implementation closely follows the OrganizationDetailPage pattern and includes all core functionality: contact information display, projects table with primary indicator, edit/delete capabilities, and navigation from contacts list and organization detail pages.
